subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|手|alt1=扌|t1=hand|散|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – to scatter with the hand.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[cast away]]; to [[let go]]
# {{lb|zh|colloquial}} to [[excrete]] ([[urine]]); to [[piss]]
# {{lb|zh|derogatory}} to [[throw off]] one's [[constraint]]
